body:
^
Out of the 4 unique seasons; summer, autumn, winter and spring, which one is your favourite and why? :)

For me, overall i think i enjoy summer the most (closely followed by spring) because (In Australia, where i live) it is consistently warm and i feel more free, like i can stay inside and be cool or just run outside and jump in the pool and hang out with friends, not to mention the long school break..

But what about you guys? Every season has its features :)

replies.body:
I like fall and winter. No annoying bees, wasps or mosquitos outside. (Not like I go outdoors anyway.)

Oh yeah, during these seasons my family's AC bill isn't that high. :D

replies.body: Winter, the days when you get up for school and it's icy cold but there's no wind are awesome, and also all the good sports start! Spring and Autumn are okay but summer is just too hot for me.

replies.body: Autumn is my favourite season! So many beautiful colours and I find it a perfect time to go for a hike in the mountains. And my birthday is in fall :P

replies.body: There are no seasons where I live. The weather changes all the time. Last summer, it was mainly foggy and all sunshine in the winter. I'd say fall/autumn though, when on occasion it's really windy but the sun is still shining and the leaves fall. c:

Each season has its good and bad aspects but I just love the warmth of summer! Here in Australia we also have our Christmas during summer and of course the long break from school.

Oh, and mangoes are in season ;)

replies.body: Well in Minnesnota there are only three seasons: winter. (Dec- Mar), pre-construction season (Apr-July), and construction season (Aug-Nov). So I would say pre-construction season, because I love rain and I love to listen to rain storms and thunder really entrigues me. I also love the smell of Rain!
replies.body_tagged: Well in Minnesnota there are only three seasons: winter. (Dec- Mar), pre-construction season (Apr-July), and construction season (Aug-Nov).
